title: Heidi Heitkamp
added: In March 2021 Heidi Heitkamp was on "Real Time With Bill Maher" where she accused actress [[Gina Carano]] of being a [[Nazi]]. Heitkamp said "She (Carano) was a Nazi" then said Carano was involved with white supremacy. Maher questioned her accusation stating that the "goal post have changed" on the definition of white supremacy while Heitkamp said that the accusation opened her up for a defamation lawsuit.<ref>https://www.inforum.com/opinion/6959781-Port-Heidi-Heitkamp-says-she-may-be-subject-to-defamation-for-calling-actress-Gina-Carano-a-Nazi</ref><ref>https://www.grandforksherald.com/opinion/6959781-Port-Heidi-Heitkamp-says-she-may-be-subject-to-defamation-for-calling-actress-Gina-Carano-a-Nazi</ref><ref></ref>

title: Heidi Heitkamp
added: In March 2021 Heidi Heitkamp was on "Real Time With Bill Maher" where she accused actress [[Gina Carano]] of being a [[Nazi]]. Heitkamp said "She (Carano) was a Nazi" then said Carano was involved with white supremacy. Maher questioned her accusation stating that the "goal post have changed" on the definition of white supremacy while Heitkamp said that the accusation opened her up for a defamation lawsuit.<ref>https://www.inforum.com/opinion/6959781-Port-Heidi-Heitkamp-says-she-may-be-subject-to-defamation-for-calling-actress-Gina-Carano-a-Nazi</ref><ref>https://www.grandforksherald.com/opinion/6959781-Port-Heidi-Heitkamp-says-she-may-be-subject-to-defamation-for-calling-actress-Gina-Carano-a-Nazi</ref>

title: Heidi Heitkamp
deleted: In 2021, Heitkamp appeared on the [[HBO]] show [[Real Time with Bill Maher]] and used libelous language against actress and fighter [[Gina Carano]]. Heitkamp now faces the prospect of a civil suit for defamation. During the show, Heitkamp acknowledged a defamation suit would be a likely result of her inflammatory comments.

title: Heidi Heitkamp
deleted: In March 2021, during an appearance on [[Real Time with Bill Maher|"Real Time With Bill Maher"]], Heitkamp called actress [[Gina Carano]] a [[Nazi]]. Heitkamp said, "She [Carano] was a Nazi", adding that Carano was involved with white supremacy. Maher questioned her accusation, saying the "goalposts have changed" on the definition of white supremacy; Heitkamp said the accusation opened her up to a defamation lawsuit.<ref>https://www.inforum.com/opinion/6959781-Port-Heidi-Heitkamp-says-she-may-be-subject-to-defamation-for-calling-actress-Gina-Carano-a-Nazi</ref><ref>https://www.grandforksherald.com/opinion/6959781-Port-Heidi-Heitkamp-says-she-may-be-subject-to-defamation-for-calling-actress-Gina-Carano-a-Nazi</ref><ref>https://www.foxnews.com/entertainment/gina-carano-fires-back-heidi-heitkamp-nazi-comment</ref><ref>https://www.newsweek.com/gina-carano-former-senator-heidi-heitkamp-nazi-comment-1579769</ref>
